website_summaries.verdict: This swing gives you plenty of options for keeping baby occupied - even colicy babies seem to agree. Two swing directions, soothing sounds and more.
pros: Options to swing in two different directions at 6 different speeds
Delight baby with overhead mobile, 16 melodies and nature sounds
Seat pad is removable, washable, and adorable
cons: The motor can run a little loud, and some find it slightly underpowered

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: Really cute swing overall. A few things make me question the quality control. The piece that is supposed to hold the power cord on the lower leg is backwards and therefore can't be used, and there's no way to turn it around. The feet don't sit flat on the floor which is really cause for concern, it also makes a metallic clicking noise while swinging because of it. I tried to adjust it but it goes right back. I'll probably return it due to poor quality when I can find the time to break it down and stuff it back in the box... Very cute but very disappointing. It was quick and easy to put together however.
customer_reviews.author: Poco Drago

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn baby seems to love her swing - we have been using it for the last month with no issues. The cloth cover for the swing is soft and was easy to machine wash when my baby had a leaky poopy diaper. I like that we are able to rotate the swing so that it can swing either side to side or front to back. She's also started looking at the mobile and seems intrigued by the little animals. I wish it was a little lighter / easier to move around but it definitely seems safe and sturdy. So far no issues with the swing!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Faulty buttons
customer_reviews.text: All the settings work as expected and the motor is very quiet. The buttons on the control panel stopped working almost immediately. After disassembly, I found the buttons "got off track" and went making proper contact with the circuit board button switches. Once I realligned the buttons, it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Swinging is too light
customer_reviews.text: Found out our newborn didn’t like it cause it didn’t swing well enough. The swinging it does on its own is too light to relax an infant. I had to use my had to give it more of a swing to put him down. When I’d let go the swinging would go back to something excessively gentle (prob so they don’t get sued). Either way, it’s a cute swing but wouldn’t recommend to others with an infant they want to get to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: ck1

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble. Primitive design. Limited feature.
customer_reviews.text: Summary Does not justify its price point considering the difficulty of assembly, lack of feature and primitive designs. Pros 1. It swings, as it supposed to Cons and Tips 1. Very difficult to assemble. (Just add few tens of bucks to get a 4moms to have a much better experience.) 2. Only swing in 2 direction and the gear need to be manually switched. 3. Design is lame and primitive. (Cannot believe it cost more than $100.) 4. Very expensive considering all cons above
customer_reviews.author: Marine C

customer_reviews.title: Your baby's BFF
customer_reviews.text: This swing is great and really is the only thing that my babies wanted to sleep in the first few months. We tried the more expensive mamaroo and the motion just didn't soothe them in the same way or make them feel as snuggled. Two of our kids used this as their full time bed during sleep regressions so I can truly say we wouldn't have survived without it! The only con to this is that it's quite large and not easy to move around. You really have to have the space for it so toting it around from room to room isn't super feasible.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this, hated MamaRoo
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the MamaRoo because I had heard such amazing things about it and thought it looked "cool". Well, our baby never liked it. He's 9 weeks old and we tried the last two months to get him to like it and he never did. He's a Colic baby and basically needs to be held or in a carrier to sleep. A couple different friends recommended this swing and I'm so glad I listened to them! He sleeps in this and will be amused by the mobile for at least 20 min at a time. Sometimes longer (up to an hour). That's HUGE for us. We've only had it two days and feel it was an amazing choice.
customer_reviews.author: miabella

customer_reviews.title: Screw hole missed in the base.
customer_reviews.text: I just received it after wait longer than I expected for the delivery and the base simply doesn't have a hole to screw the screw of one of the foot I'm pissed off
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy & dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The product is very dangerous for babies. This makes noise when the baby is swinging. I am very much worried and it is very scary. It is not at all safe for babies. The baby might even fall down. Please see attached video for the noise
customer_reviews.author: Vishnuvardhan Purusotham

customer_reviews.title: Such A Slow Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly this thing is slow. We used to have one of the other versions of this Fisher Price swing, the $150 version and after our first kid the motor broke. Replaced it with this cheaper version and the motor is terrible. This is full speed. Full speed on our old version tossed the baby side to side pretty fast, which looks crazy, but it’s what these little babies want! This slow version isn’t doing it for my kid. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swing!!
customer_reviews.text: My little nephew used this for the first 7 months of his life and it’s amazing! It was easy to put together and the fact that it swings vertically AND horizontally is awesome for picky sleepers! My nephew would fall asleep whenever he was placed in this swing and I would think it was very soothing for him :) the only small thing about this swing is that it makes a little noise after using it so often and I’m sure it has to do with the baby getting bigger and gaining weight as well, but no biggie! Overall this swing is awesome and gives adults a little break😇
customer_reviews.author: anita schatz

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies upto 1 year age and for first time parents !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and a life saver for first time parents. Its been of great help to my wife during the day as she works part time. I bought same one for my sister as a gift. I wouldnt leave my baby in this whole night. We use it mainly during the day for naps and early mornings when we need sound sleep 😄 I have seen few reviews with complaints on the creeking sound, it happens to mine too and I found the reason and solution. Just pull the legs of the swing further away(spread) that should stop the creeking sound. I have a feeing that my son will outgrow this very soon(close to 1year).
customer_reviews.author: Jay J

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, not that good
customer_reviews.text: This swing was difficult to assemble. Not too difficult but at the same time no major thought has been put into making it easy for consumers. The lowest level of the swing is too fast. I wish it was possible to just produce a very slight motion, but it looks way too fast at even the lowest level. The motor makes a swoosh swoosh sound with each swing, which is annoying. Overall, a low quality product. Update: It's usable, and better than my initial impressions. But leaves a lot to be desired, but still works which is really the most important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Poor motor
customer_reviews.text: We had the snugabunny swing and it died while using it for our newborn after 8 years and 2 other kids. We were so impressed with it that we wanted the same brand. Fisher Price has changed these products and they are NOT GOOD! It’s swing strength isn’t nearly as good and the materials are not made well. We purchased this one and another one to compare and both are terrible. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: ChesterT

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any baby!
customer_reviews.text: The swing has been great! We set it up in 10 mins. Our little man stays asleep longer after first falling asleep in the swing. 1: swing speed has 5 or 6 different speeds 2: the swing plays different lullaby’s for sleep or for waking baby up. The volume is great, can raise and lower it. 3 swing can be changed for baby to swing side to side or back and forward. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy this again. Our night time routine is feeding, burping, wrap him and let him fall asleep in swing and then transfer to crib. He sleeps all night!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not a total necessity for our family.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $99, and for that price point, I think it’s a good swing when compared to the $250 models and $60 models. The motor is fairly loud, and the vibrate setting is louder. Doesn’t bother me too much because it’s like white noise at this point. I don’t use the swing as often as some of the other reviewers, except for the nature sounds that I turn on when I rock my baby to sleep in my arms. She only gets 30 minute naps in the swing, compared to longer naps in her crib or bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, did not work for our little one.
customer_reviews.text: The construction did not feel sturdy at all. Took about 25 min to be put together, easy to assemble. Definitely not top quality, the legs of the swing felt rough. The highest speed was not enough for our little one to fell asleep, actually the most she slept in it was 30 min, after we have rocked her for 20 min. The motor is a little noisy, although it did not seem to bother the baby. The pad is nice and soft. We returned the swing and got a Graco Dreamglider instead. It does not rock two way but works much better for the little one. The two vibrations mode helps soothe the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Get one of these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wouldn't sit in anything.. A Mama-Roo, a bouncer.. etc. She screamed her head off in everything we tried. We bought this swing and she LOVES it. She will sit in it forever and not whine. We can finally sit down to dinner without holding her in our arms. Seriously, you new mommas who aren't sure what to invest in... I'm telling you invest in this swing!! It's worth it. I will say it's a bit of a space taker upper, but still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely as advertised, but still a good unit
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and the motion is whisper quiet. The speaker could be a little louder. Most disappointing part was the leaves on the mobile do not articulate ad shown in the video or the product description. I've included a photo and the mobile only rotates. Not entirely as advertised. I chose this model over one with lights in the mobile and regret that decision now. Over all good unit. Easier to move around the house than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Swing is huge!
customer_reviews.text: My baby has been using this swing since she was 1 month old, she's 5 months now and she still likes it. The swing is huge and takes up so much space. It also screeches alot and one of the little caps at the end of the legs fell off. I tried to screw it back on, but it just won't stay. I wish the swing was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Esme

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Bought TWO swings for our twin boys. We have been using them for 3 weeks only and one of the swings started turning on full speed without even touching a single button and wouldn’t stop unless completely unplugged. Now it won’t work at all. For this much money I’d expect this product to last longer then THREE WEEKS!!! I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Denea

customer_reviews.title: Easily Paid For Itself
customer_reviews.text: My baby hit the 2 month mark and became super fussy during the day, fighting off sleep. The only way she’d fall asleep was if I rocked her in my arms, which was killing my back. Ordered this puppy, Amazon got it here ASAP (thank God) and it’s been amazing. I was able to easily, and quickly, put it together in 10 minutes. 1 minute of her swinging in this and she was out, and my body gets a rest. It’s inexpensive compared to others and gets the job done. I like that you can change the swing directions, baby likes the mirror in the middle of the mobile and the tunes (there’s night time tunes and daytime tunes).
customer_reviews.author: H.Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The product was good at initially but the swing speed at level 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two months before. The product was good at initially but the swing speed at level 1 is too fast now and the music is playing very slowly. I couldn't put my baby in the swing since it is swinging very fast. I want to return it or replace it
customer_reviews.author: Meena T

customer_reviews.title: Wish I cld adjust the seat
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but after 13yrs btwn children then having another child during COVID19 of all time I didn’t get to see this item in store or I wld have been more picky and probably have gone with some else. It came quickly, was easy to build, and is pretty quite (no clicking noise as it swings) but I rmbr the swing frm 18 years ago w/ my 1st son and the seat cld recline to a sitting position but this swing is only in one position. So I guess it’s only for sleeping?... and I’ll have to get something else to sit my baby up. All in all good product for price and helping baby fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swing
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE; 2/27/20 LOVE this swing! Our baby sleeps in it most of the time. I love the fact that you can move the seat part in 3 different directions. Having a plug is a must have versus battery operated....We just put this swing together, as our baby is expected next month. It is absolutely adorable and has lots of features. We tested it out and everything worked great, except the product was missing the lap belt. We called fisher price and one is on the way without any issue. I like that you have the option to swing two different ways and multiple speeds. A big plus is that you’re able to plug it in rather then using batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu1020

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves so far!
customer_reviews.text: First someone wrote you need batteries in for this to work- that is false. This was a little difficult to assemble given you have to use a hex key and you also need a philips head screw driver. I did end up putting most of it together myself while holding my 3 mo old though (hence why I wanted to try this!!). She has been swinging in it for 20 minutes now without a peep. I’m amazed. She is a baby who always seems to need to be jiggled, patted or bounced and this is totally placating her right now. WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Given a used, terrible quality product
customer_reviews.text: Ok... amazon.... you sent me a used swing with spit up on the swing, scuff marks all over, and it was thrown into a box that barely looked like it made it to my house. It was mashed in on all sides. All the pieces were randomly thrown in this box. Not impressed. Not even close. I don’t leave bad reviews, but this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Sumr14

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh, it’s alright
customer_reviews.text: This swing is alright. It takes up a huge amount of space. Also it arrived with damaged installation hardware, but we were able to buy some hardware to use to put together. My son isn’t a huge fan of it because it doesn’t swing very fast, we purchased the graco slim spaces swing and he prefers that one. I do like that it is plug in and the automated mobile is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne S

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Swing
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, the swing is wonderful. It has multiple speeds, sounds, angles where the baby can rock (front to back, or side to side). My baby in particular didnt really care for the swing, but i can see why others would write glowing reviews. My only beef was using the Amazon warehouse to buy this. I saved some money by buying it used via amazon, but it showed up with a knick on the frame, and old poop on the seat cover. It washed right out, but still, some QC would've been appreciated. All in all im happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Swing function doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few months before baby was born. Once baby arrived i tried to use it for the time and the swing function doesnt work! The music works, the mobile works, but not the swinging! So frustrating! So now its basically just a spot to set the baby..
customer_reviews.author: riss25

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this swing yesterday. Unfortunately I didn't realize until AFTER it had been assembled that the buttons on the motorized top didn't appear right. The button to slow the swing down, and the button to lower the volume of the sounds were both stuck, and not functional at all. Totally disappointed that after taking the time to assemble...this will need to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Hall

customer_reviews.title: Your baby will love this swing! Which means so will you.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this swing! It was simple to put together and appears to be great quality. It does have a little noise when it swings but it’s very faint, almost like white noise. The sound of it swinging doesn’t bother baby or me. The only reason I’m mentioning it is because I read a ton of reviews and some of the reviews complained about it. I would recommend this swing and plan to use it for the next child!
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful baby swing
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this swing & it was such a great investment. It was pretty easy to instal, I think I got it put together in 20 mins. Some of the bolts were finicky to thread but other than that, assembly was smooth. There are 3 different music/sound options & the speed of the swing & volume of the sound are adjustable. Once baby is in the swing, I have to help the swing function because it seems to struggle to get up to speed with the weight. One of the deciding purchasing factors for me is that it can be plugged into an outlet, I feel like this swing or any others would drain batteries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this first
customer_reviews.text: This swing was a total game changer for us!! I initially bought the Mamaroo swing and my daughter hated it, which is really rude, considering how expensive it is! I bought this swing on a whim one morning at 5am, after being up all night with my screaming colicky baby. It arrived quickly and my daughter instantly LOVED it! I’ve never been able to put her down without her screaming until we bought this. Now, she happily entertains herself, watching the mobile until she puts herself to sleep, then she takes a lengthy nap! This is such a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: MorgansMom7348

customer_reviews.title: Worth the value
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing. Second time we've bought it. This first one was a elephant and worked as intended. This one so far so good. We have prime so shipping was fast and arrived undamaged. As far as Assembly, it doesn't get any easier. Your first time parents never assemble won't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan magliazzo

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret getting this
customer_reviews.text: If you’re on the fence about this, don’t be. You won’t regret buying this or adding it to your registry. We have limited space in our living room and didn’t think we wanted something big like this so we held off until our baby was 7 weeks old. Then we caved and bought it. Best decision ever! She loves it! If your infant loves movement likes ours does (riding in the car and stroller) then this is perfect. Not noisy. Great settings. Good price. We are really glad we have this now! She is taking decent naps and we can get stuff done around the house.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: For our first we didn’t put a swing on our registry (we instead put the Fisher Price Rock and Play seat). What a mistake! The rock and play didn’t have enough movement for our son. The first night we set him in this swing he was asleep in 5 minutes! This was the only way I could get a break during the first few weeks. Our son is now almost three months old and over 13 pounds. He still loves it! I call the moving animals his “friends” and he loves talking to them! My husband was able to put this together in about 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: chemgirl

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY baby accessory you need
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since my son was 2 months old. I caved and got it because literally nothing else helped him to ease his reflux. We tried the mamaroo, sungapuppy bouncer and other bouncers and chairs and nothing really is as good as this is. He is now 7 months old and loves being in it. It's one of the few products on the market that swings both ways and has two recline functions. It really is the only baby thing you need to put them down in. Don't get anything else.
customer_reviews.author: saqib

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy
customer_reviews.text: Although it came with a defective button out of the box, our daughter loves this swing at 3 weeks old. It lulls her to sleep and the options to turn, twist and move the swing head support up and down is immaculate. The noise level actually isn't too bad speaking for the motor. The controls are a huge plus. The only take away is if you are limited on space the legs are pretty long and wide. I can say you won't be disappointed in the swing. There are quite a few options to satisfy every little one's needs.
customer_reviews.author: MommyShopper3

customer_reviews.title: Better than 4moms
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased the 4moms Mamaroo swing which our son HATED. It was disappointing because it was so expensive. After searching endlessly online, we decided to purchase the snugapuppy swing and it is a hit! He loves being rocked back and forth. The mobile above moves and the music is great. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase for my 7 week old. I am finally able to be hands free for a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Riley C

customer_reviews.title: Spare yourself the possible disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It probably honestly is a decent swing, however with my experience with this product, one of the upper legs came poorly manufactured. I’ve been unable to put one of the screws in with the Allen wrench because it seems like the hole it’s supposed to go through is for one displaced and for two won’t screw in to the other side. Highly irked because I spent this amount of money for the pieces not to be working correctly. Please make sure all the pieces to your product are workable before just sending them out
customer_reviews.author: Armani

customer_reviews.title: Clicking Swing
customer_reviews.text: We have had this swing for two weeks and it has worked great thus far. However it has now started clicking at each swing, which wakes up the baby and defeats the purpose of the swing. I’ll have to contact customer service about that, we have only had it for two weeks after all. Also I wish it had some lights on the mobile above. The swing we had for our first child had lights as well as music and it was great. Otherwise, the swing is fine, baby has liked it until the clicking problem.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great until they get bigger
customer_reviews.text: Was a great swing until the baby reached about 14 pounds. Now it's LOUD. Good thing he's a heavy sleeper!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newborn and we absolutely love it! The seat can be reclined so that baby can lay back for naps but still be elevated. So far it has been a great swing. Our baby loves it and when she is sleepy all we have to do is turn on the music and she is out almost instantly. I definitely recommend this swing. The only thing that I’m not a fan of is how it is not easily maneuverable, but that’s not a huge deal for us since we have another baby chair that can be moved from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my baby calm!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not really complicated to assemble compared to other swings. It works well too! It sounded a little bit creaky when it swings but its a swing so what do you expect. But it is not as loud. And my daughter can sleep pretty well in it too! But remember , the extra dog cushion that include in the package will make the baby a bit warm if the weather is hot. You might wanna check your little one so that he/she comfortable and feel not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: syai_chan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for babies
customer_reviews.text: We tried several thing to make our baby sleep but he will usually fuss on something. I even tried sleeping him with in our hand and we sitting on the rocking chair and did not work. There were various other options out there but this one we got and seems best decision. Baby sleeps for long time. Only thing we don't like is there is little steep and not so good for new born babies who are less than a month old. Else this is an awesome thing for making babies calm and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for it so much !! I hoped it would help with my 3 weeks baby when I am busy with 17 month baby) But it was disappointment from the first screw... It is impossible to fix screws at all .. because they are supposed to be set in just holes. I decided to skip it and to put plastic legs without using screws . But I had the same problem with bolts .. From one side it was ok and I did it fast ( so... I do understand how it works) But from another side... My attempts to assemble to parts ... were in vain. I gave up to try.... I am returning
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I am a nursing student and a mom to a newborn and a preschooler. My newborn was napping in her moby wrap almost all day and would wake up shortly after I put her down. This swing has allowed me to study and get cleaning done while she napped for 3 or 4 hours at a time in this swing. I am so happy with this product. It is a necessity for me now!
customer_reviews.author: shayna

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for - can swing front to back or side to side, has a really cute pattern/design, and is very simple to use. It's also at a good height, not to tall, but high enough off the ground that I can easily bend down to it after a C-section. I am a little nervous about blow outs, because it doesn't look like it will be easy to remove and reattach the cover for washing. Also, the swing speed button tends to stick down after you push it, but doesn't affect functionality so I'm not really bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaMamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 7 week old, so far she likes it. The swinging motion is super fast even on the lowest setting, I wish it was a bit slower. The volume is good, assembly was easy, my baby seems very comfortable in it. She fell asleep very fast in it. It does make a noise when in motion.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Tuleneva

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Life saver.
customer_reviews.text: Good investment for great value and life saver. My wife loves it, my newborn fell asleep shortly, I found it reliable. Before having this product, I had to sing and swing my newborn to sleep. After two weeks, I had back pain. Then my wife bought it and I felt like eventually I alone again see the lights thru the dark. It’s very easy to assemble (my wife did the job). It’s easy to clean up. The volume and speaker quality is great at this level no noise found while playing music. It comes with three way swing, left to right, right to the left and back to the forth. The best thing is that it doesn’t smell.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, unstable.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had 3 swings in 6 kids, and they continually get more expensive but are made very cheaply now. Im very startled how cheaply this one is made, and disappointed. Despite taking up the space of a standard recliner, it still shakes while in use, like my 15 lb 3 mo baby is too heavy for it. By the time my baby is 6 mos old he will be too heavy for this swing. I will not recommend to anyone, and wont be buying fisherprice anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst assembly ever. The instructions are very clear but the quality of the product is so shoddy that made the assembly a complete pain in the butt. I've assembled so many things for the baby's room and this was by far the worst quality in terms of fitment. And one of the legs doesn't fully touch the ground. Extremely poor quality control at Fisher Price...
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So sweet for our little son
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! So sweet for our little son. Easy to assemble, great songs/sounds and volume control. We usually use it on "3" for the swing speed, but it goes higher and lower. Love the adapter!! The fabric is super soft- the colors are muted. The seat is nice and deep, and even though this has a larger footprint, it's 100% worth it! We had one for our daughter about 3 years ago- I didn't even hesitate when it was time to get one for our son. There are a lot of swing options out there, but this is truly a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cox

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: If anyone were to ask me what's the # 1 thing you feel was indispensable for your newborn (besides the essential like diapers, wipes etc) I would say this swing!! Nothing calms her down like this. When she is inconsolable and won't sleep, turn off the lights, strap her in this bad boy with music on medium volume, she is out in 15 mins. She's now 5 months and sadly will outgrow it soon :(
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: the motor does NOT last
customer_reviews.text: This swing stopped swinging as fast as it did when we first got it within 2 weeks. Its as if the motor couldn't handle the baby. It still swings, but very slow. My son loves laying in this, but is not found of the the slowness. If you are looking for a fast swinging swing like I was, I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Maisy18

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this swing! I use it every single day. My baby is almost 13 months, and it swings get with no problem. It’s high quality, easy to use, and rocks my baby to sleep for naps. I’m going to be really sad when my little one is too big for it!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY WILKINSON

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This swing has been a complete game changer!! We have a very fussy baby that likes to be held 24/7. She is 7weeks and this mama was getting tired of not being able to do anything without having the baby attached to her in a carrier! As my husband and I were finishing putting the swing together the baby was screaming ready to be picked up as soon as we finished we put her and the swing and just like that she quit crying and was soothed by the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work! Waste of Money and Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter but did not use it immediately, So I left it in the original package until it was time for her to use it, after I took the time to assemble the swing, I followed all the instructions, turned it on, but it didn’t work, I tried everything, watched videos, but it still did not work, unfortunately the return window had passed so I could not return it, and I didn’t have the energy to start disassembling it, with a baby in the house, so it’s just sitting in one corner in my house taking a lot of space. For me, it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kemi

customer_reviews.title: Love it but the mobile makes a loud clicking sound!
customer_reviews.text: So glad i purchase this, and I used my registry discount so it was a steal. I was worried baby wouldn't take to it, and I will say it's taken a few weeks. But now at 8 weeks i can put him in it if he's a little fussy and he calms down after a few minutes. One annoyance is that the mobile part has started to make this very loud clicking sound to the point I can't activate it, because if he falls asleep it's going to wake him up.
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: Babies love it
customer_reviews.text: We own 3 of these swings that we use with our triplets. We love them, the babies love them...it's a win. For some reason 1 of them was difficult to assemble and sits a bit uneaven with the floor. The swing is still usable and our babies live in the swings several hours each day.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Arning

customer_reviews.title: Good swing.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: the mobile that moves, mirror dome, adjustable ways to swing, soft seat with safety harness, battery & plug-in power. Dislikes: awkward to put together by self, size-very large base (but sturdy), seat doesn't have a recline position, only flat (baby can't look around), no point to canopy. All-in-all this is a good product but if you have only a small place to put it... I wouldn't recommend due to its size.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great swing but may have motor problems. Be prepared to call FP customer service.
customer_reviews.text: SEE LATEST UPDATE... The swing was delivered two days ago. We put it together the same day, following the instructions perfectly. 24 hours later, the swinging function stopped working. It swings for about 30 seconds and then stops. My son is only 12 lbs, so that's not the problem. Today is Saturday and Fisher-Price customer service is closed until Monday. UPDATE: I spoke with Fisher Price customer service. They were super helpful and told me that they have been having occasional problems with the motor of this swing. They are sending me a brand new swing with free two day delivery. I changed my rating up to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: great product- no batteries- great mobile- ok sounds
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. nice to have a swing that DOES NOT USE BATTERIES the little mobile moves up and down and also spins which is cool. The middle of the mobile also has a mirror our baby likes to see himself in. Sounds are okay... not great. It includes: A sleep sound, nighttime bug sounds, and a general baby sound are available. wish there were more on this, but that is the only downside to me. Which isn't a deal-breaker. It does take up quite a bit of space, but it is super safe for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Bighouse25

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swing but with a tiny flaw
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this and it was one of the very few things that I could use to get my baby to fall asleep in the first weeks/months of her life. My only issue with this product is that it seems a bit uneven? Which makes a clicking sound every now and then and the only thing I can do to stop it is to pull the feet further apart or put something in between the legs. But other than that my baby still loves her swing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Berger

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This swing was perfect for my daughter! I tried the mamaroo, and the ingenuity swing thinking that they cost more so she would like it... I was wrong! she for some reason just liked this seat much better. The seat is much more inclined so it feels like she's in a carseat which she loves. It holds its shape really well for the price. The only problem i found while my husband assembled it is one of the holes was too small for the screw so the seat wobbled a bit when he attached it but my husband was able to make the hole bigger and it works just fine. Its a perfect fit for us without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy for “open box”
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the “like new” open box on this swing bc well money is tight and i wasnt sure if she would even like it. It came with one piece missing. Not too terrible. At first she didnt really like it but she has grown to like it. The buttons get stuck sometimes so it will speed up her rockjng speed without me knowing. Dont like. Doesnt make noise. Pretty quiet. Not movable. Its large and bulky and a pain to move. But overall it does its job and for the price paid. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tester

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: There are many choices but this was the cutest and the most financially frugal swing I found. Yes, you'll here the swing with lite clicks and grinding of the swing but it's minimal and it doesn't bother the baby at all. I'm fortunate to be able to bring my baby to work with me in the swing fits perfectly in the corner of my office I would definitely recommend the swing to anyone
customer_reviews.author: MrzBouff

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing.
customer_reviews.text: We love this swing. We got this and sent back a really crappy ingenuity swing that had so many issues. We haven't experienced the motor sound at all and the only time you hear the slight movement of the swing is if the legs need spread a little further apart. My baby absolutely loves it. He stares and coos to himself in the mirror, which the other swing didn't have, and I love that I can turn him to swing whichever way because sometimes turning him changes how he feels and he stops fussing.
customer_reviews.author: Aislin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product as we expectex we would. Worka great and love all the features. The main reason we bought this one was that it stays running all ight and doesnt shut off like other ones. Keeps our baby happy and she sleeps great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Canova

customer_reviews.title: I never thought we would find one our daughter would like..... and then!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter HATED the $200+ mamaroo. We were at a loss. Only would nap if we held her. Bought this when she was 8 weeks old and it’s been a lifesaver!! My only complaint.... I wish the music would be able to start stop on an app. The music does cut off and it’s a mad dash across the room to turn it back on BUT I highly recommend. Love this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is pretty great. My 6 month old is no longer using it, because she is incredibly long for her age and she's rolling and trying to crawl. For those reasons, she's not safe in it anymore. For new parents, I must tell you that this swing made it so my baby would relax, be calm and sleep while I did dishes or found something to eat or refill coffee cups after sleepless nights. You can't go wrong with this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Strand

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it was hard to put together but this was a life saver. My baby would not nap in his crib but he loves this swing. Even when he gets to big for it I will save for the next one. It was worth the money. The only thing I can’t figure out is how to easily remove the head to the puppy dog part to wash it but the bottom half comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing saved my life....
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, my daughter would not sleep and was fussy 24/7. She has a problem being colicky. This swing gave her mother and I a break but even better, I finally was able to see my baby have a moment of peace. The only thing I see wrong is that after several weeks I noticed the bed start leaning slightly to the right. I am not sure how it got loose and can not find a way to tighten it. If not for that it would have been five starts.
customer_reviews.author: jeportillo

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves this !
customer_reviews.text: Our baby boy loves this swing and cradle, we are currently using this as a cradle as our boy is only a month old but he likes it so far and sleeps well during nap time. we definitely recommend this product. Only thing I didn't like about this product is removing the puppy mat to clean it or throw it in the washer. its cumbersome and needs some work especially when the baby spits up in it. Its not easy to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep Adapa

customer_reviews.title: Large but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried 4 different swings in the last 5 years with our three kids. This is our favorite overall. It offers the most movement, which all our babies have liked. Better than the mamaroo or the graco glider we had. The only real downside is that it’s quite large, but if you have the room for it it’s definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to fully put together this swing mainly because there was no hole drilled in the back of plastic pieces where the screws insert in two of the pieces...so I was able to put the screws into the holes, but not secure the insert at all...second the feet do not lie flat on the ground...third, the swing squeaks as it rocks. Overall I was not impressed by the quality of this swing for the price it is listed at as all of these flaws make it seem rather like a cheap piece of junk. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: wynds12

customer_reviews.title: A little regret for choosing a wrong product
customer_reviews.text: First of all my kid is 4 months old now! This occupies more space because of the wide legs! If you have short space try a different product! Now my kid if 14 pounds and the speed is reducing gradually and the noise is increasing! I dont know whats wrong with this I always feel insecure because of this sound! Fisher is great brand but this product is not up to my expectation, now I am planning to buy something good!
customer_reviews.author: Mithun

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: We got this swing for our newborn and he loved/loves it! He is 3 months now and will take long naps in it. He loves watching himself in the little dome mirror and the rocking motion puts him to sleep. The swing itself doesn’t take much room; we have it cornered in our living room. I would suggest this for all parents unless baby happened to have a vertigo. Also, they sell a similar version at target that’s more expensive ($20-$40 more) that has less perks!
customer_reviews.author: Effie

customer_reviews.title: Tooooo loud updates we love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s really loud well the motor. Kind of annoying. Doesn’t really help with my migraines. Update: it picked up speed I think I had it laid out wrong my baby loves it ! He loves to stair at the puppies, he looks so cute in it and it snuggles him up and keeps him warm! We literally travel with it I know we’re crazy right thawing it apart then back together but it keeps him happy 🥰 we love it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not cool. Way too much work putting it together and ...
customer_reviews.text: Put the whole thing together and it doesn't power on at all! I plugged it in to 3 different outlets and my baby is due in a month. Not cool. Way too much work putting it together and it doesn't even function! To top it off the feet don't sit safely or properly on the ground. Sending the garbage back.
customer_reviews.author: Dezteni Levine

customer_reviews.title: Before I bought this swing I tried the Mamaroo 4 (latest version) and ended up returning it because he hated it. He also wouldn't take naps of more ...
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a life saver!! I would give it 10 stars if I could! I have a 2 month old with acid reflux and he would not stay more that 5 minutes without crying if I wasn't holding him. Before I bought this swing I tried the Mamaroo 4 (latest version) and ended up returning it because he hated it. He also wouldn't take naps of more than 15 minutes during the day. When I saw the good reviews on this one I decided to give it a try, and I don't know why I didn't bought it sooner! I can finally take breaks during the day and get things done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent except for loud squeak
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this is great, except that squeak. And it’s loud! I’ve tried spreading the legs (works for few seconds to few minutes), bringing legs together (Doesn’t swing well). Next going to try rubber pads even though that’s already at the bottom. But hoping the alternative pads will do a better job. Out of ideas otherwise. Note that this is on hardwood floors. Think this might not be an issue on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bkindtoall

customer_reviews.title: Too large, not gentle, too difficult to put baby in and out
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but takes up a large footprint and feels cheaply designed compared to the momaroo. It is difficult to put your kid in and out of the swing due to the location of the overhead arm. The swing motion is way too fast, and there’s only really one speed. The ambient sounds are a little annoying annoying and needs more variety of sounds and songs. Neighbor had a momaroo and regretted this purchase after trying that one.
customer_reviews.author: PushingPxls

customer_reviews.title: ... two of these for our twins and they are wonderful! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for our twins and they are wonderful! Highly recommend. They take up a lot of room so be prepared but totally worth it for us. The legs were a little unever, one side didn't lay flat on the floor but we later realized it didn't make a different and didn't seem wobbly like I thought it would. Love the design and colors- not so "babyish" and fits well with out grey color scheme in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: MnTwinMom

customer_reviews.title: GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: GET this freaking swing! My baby girl has been falling asleep in it for her daytime naps now for 2 months she’s about to be 4 months old. Very well made. Has cute little creatures that spin at the top with music, or like cricket/calming sounds. Different speeds for the swing to swing also. She always falls asleep in it or will just hang out while I clean or cook.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary West

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described & shown In pictures! False advertising! This is the old model!
customer_reviews.text: I paid top dollar and had this shipped to my son & it is not as described! Part of the mobile is supposed to go up and down & it doesnt its stationary, Im assuming this is why its now $35.00 cheaper than it was when I purchased it! Paying $169.59 for something it should work as shown! Order Summary Item(s) Subtotal:$159.99 Shipping & Handling:$0.00 Total before tax:$159.99 Estimated tax to be collected:$9.60 Grand Total:$169.59
customer_reviews.author: Jamn

customer_reviews.title: It’s basically my part time babysitter (kidding, kind of ;)
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a life saver! We started with another popular swing and my daughter was not a fan. We are soooo happy we tried this one! She LOVES it! I can actually have a cup of coffee in the morning while she spends time with her “friends” (the spinning guys up at the top). It’s by far my daughter’s favorite of all the gear we have :) if I had to complain about one thing, the legs don’t sit flush on the floor but it does not inhibit it’s performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swing but little unlevel
customer_reviews.text: My 1 month old baby loves this swing and the mirror on the mobile! The only thing I don’t like is that the music and mobile turn off automatically after a few minutes. Also the legs aren’t level so it rocks a little but it’s not so bad I’m worried about the whole thing tipping over or anything like that; however, for the price I would like for it to be sturdy (reason for the 4 stars and not 5)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but squeaks loud
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a awesome! It helps sooth my colicky baby boy. I’m really glad I decided to get it because I was a bit hesitant. I took away a star because it squeaks quite loudly and occasionally shakes but it’s not a deal breaker for us. Also, there’s no timer on the music which would be great! It automatically shuts off and id like to be able to adjust it to go longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: New parents very happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift the parents loved it. The baby used it till she was about 7 months old, and she out grew it!
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Smooth swing
customer_reviews.text: This is was a great purchase! My baby hated his glider swing. This one smoothly rocks and he actually falls asleep in it!! The music is like a mini boom box, I was surprised how loud it got. I read a review about how it must have batteries to work- this was not the case it plugs right in no problem. My only complaint is putting it together. A couple of the screws didn’t go straight in and took me about a hour to finally get it together myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time we are getting this product and always having issues and having to send it back. This time around after my husband spent hours installing the swing only to find out it doesn't work when plugged in really annoying fisher price needs to get their act together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s quiet and sturdy. I had to throw away a different style fisher price swing cuz it was unstable and squeaky. No complaints with this one and it’s less expensive than the one I threw away. Just make sure you spread the legs out all the way to keep it nice and stable. I like that the mobile moves and has a big reflective mirror. Baby loved to look at herself
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Aronica

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a hassle
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most difficult experience I’ve had putting something together. I’m currently pregnant and thought putting this thing together would be easy. It was the opposite. Some of the screws barely fit, so you have to keep trying and trying until you make it fit. The legs are a bit uneven so I’m curious to see how the baby will sleep. It seems a bit “flat” but I might just have my husband take a look at it. I have personal satisfaction after putting it together but it was a bit of a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Franco

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price Needs Quality Assurance
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Fisher Price: I was excited to put this together until I ran into a road block. It looks like they missed their quality assurance check before sending this unit out to me. There is a locking channels where a dowel slides into but it looks like they forgot to cut both sides of the channel. (See pictures) There is no way to get the metal to slide down without the channel for it to slide into. I returned to see if they send me a new one that I can use but hopefully this one doesn’t have the same issue. Now I have to wait for the next one to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Connor O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: It’s not our most favorite swing we’ve ever owned, but it is very cute. It has lots of different configurations for speed and position so finding one that is comfortable for baby isn’t hard. It’s kind of loud and the support isn’t the best for a teeny newborn, but as he’s growing he seems a lot more comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set up and keep my baby asleep comfortably
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to set up and keep my baby asleep comfortably, giving me some free time. The music automatically turns off faster than I expect. Aslo, the swing motion does make some noise, not too loud but def noticeable. I guess it's still ok since my baby doesn't fall asleep when it's too quiet. I only leave the baby in there for max 2 hours since the bottom isn't flat, it's not good for them to sleep in for a long time since it might affect their spine. Beside that, it's a good product for baby to have some good sleep and getting some sunlight at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tran

customer_reviews.title: The sounds are great and she loves the mobile and the mirror that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the only thing our baby would sleep in for the first 4 months. The sounds are great and she loves the mobile and the mirror that are above the seat. We love that it's reclined far enough back to feel comfortable leaving her in it for extended periods of sleep. It's also narrower than our other swing keeping her "snug" and in a safe position. The bucket seat of our graco swing is so big she slips side to side and her neck is never positioned straight which I hate. However because of it's more snug fitting seat she is outgrowing this swing quickly. It's still the swing of choice though!
customer_reviews.author: Hot Dog

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I was mixed on making this purchase due to other reviews. I’m so glad we did. We’ve only been using it so far for two days but we love it. Assembly was fairly easy and I’m not an expert by any means. Noise is to be expected but nothing crazy loud. Baby seems to highly enjoy. I’d absolutely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Sweet Snugapuppy Dreams Cradle 'n Swing
product_meta.description: Style:Snugapuppy​It's soft, snuggly, and oh so soothing—your baby will love snuggling in to the Fisher Price Sweet Snugapuppy Dreams Cradle 'n Swing; With two swinging motions (side to side and head to toe) and a variety of other customizable features, you can choose and combine what your little one likes best. The adorable and ultra plush puppy seat pad is super cozy (and machine washable!), and the overhead mobile has three cuddly friends and a mirrored dome for your snuggle bug to enjoy. Plus, the plug in option saves on batteries, so little ones can relax, swing and play in soothing comfort. Where development comes into play Sensory: Gentle motions, soft fabrics, cuddly friends overhead and soothing music & sounds help stimulate your baby's developing senses. Security & Happiness: Gentle motions, music & sounds provide comfort and security for your little one. If the swing is too fast try a lower speed setting, if the low setting provides too much swinging motion for the child, try placing one end of a blanket underneath the child and let the other end of the blanket drape down while swinging.
feature_bullets: 2 ways to swing; Side to side or head to toe
6 swing speeds, 16 soothing songs & nature sounds
Easy to convert to different positions—just press button and turn
Machine washable, plush seat pad with deluxe Sweet Snugapuppy Dreams body insert & head support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,159 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
